tool_description: An APIs collection for getting sample profiles and city Data for testings for frontend or mock testings.
name: Mocking Rock
title: Mocking Rock

api_list.name: Get Geo location Of IP address
api_list.description: Pass IP address to get its geo location and other details

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: Send a proper IPV4 .If valid IP will return result.

api_list.name: Get Locales List
api_list.description:
You can use this API to get the list of available locales 
Which can be used to generate profile APIs response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com/profile/known_locales"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com/profile/known_locales"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Sample BusinessProfile
api_list.description:
Use this API to get fake-generated Business Profile sample data.
By default, it will generate "en"  locale for a single count.
If count query is greater than 1 it will randomize the generated profiles 
to a different locale. 
To set a default locale pass it as the query.List of the locale you can get from locale API.
In case of the wrong locale is given it will return the result based on default settings as mentioned above.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Pass locale to set language and regional details of profile generated. For single count by default its \\\"en\\\" .

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Use to get number of profiles . Max count 1000 for now

api_list.name: Get Sample UserProfile
api_list.description:
Use this API to get fake-generated user Profile sample data.
By default, it will generate "en"  locale for a single count.
If count query is greater than 1 it will randomize the generated profiles 
to a different locale. 
To set a default locale pass it as the query.List of the locale you can get from locale API.
In case of the wrong locale is given it will return the result based on default settings as mentioned above.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Use to get number of profiles . Max count 1000 for now

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Pass locale to set language and regional details of profile generated. For single count by default its \"en\" .

api_list.name: Get Country Codes
api_list.description: Use this API to get list of countries, Their ISO3 & ISO2 codes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com/country/countrycode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com/country/countrycode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mocking-rock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Countrywise city data
api_list.description:
Use this API to get city list of country. You need to send country name or ISO3 or ISO2 code 
as query to get it. Which you can get it from other API "Country Codes"

optional_parameters.name: iso3
optional_parameters.description: PASS 3 character long ISO3 code. You  can get it from country Codes API

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: PASS  country name . You  can get it from country Codes API

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Pass count value to get maximum number of results to be returned if available

optional_parameters.name: iso2
optional_parameters.description: PASS 2 character long ISO2 code. You  can get it from country Codes API

api_list.name: City Data
api_list.description:
Get list of citys.
Count limit should be less the 1000

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
If not passed by default 10 will be considered
Maximum can be 1000 for now.
